dialogue.htmlContent:
#IF(game.isWorkTime())

You find yourself standing in front of a rather peculiar shop. Although there's a sign declaring 'Arcane Arts' to be [style.colourGood(open)], the interior is very dimly-lit, and you notice that most of the Arcade's shoppers are giving this particular store a wide berth. Wanting to take a closer look, you walk up to the entrance, and, looking through the glass into the shop's gloomy interior, you see signs of movement behind the counter.

A sign hanging in the door's window declares that the [style.colourMinorGood(opening hours are [unit.time(9)]-[unit.time(17)])]. You could step inside and browse the wares on offer if you wanted to.

#ELSE

A hanging sign fixed to the wall of the shop in front of you declares the name of the premises as 'Arcane Arts'. Just like the rest of the shops in the arcade, this store is currently [style.colourBad(closed)], although it's apparent from even a cursory glance through the windows that the gloomy interior is stocked with weapons and potions.

A sign hanging in the door's window declares that the [style.colourMinorBad(opening hours are [unit.time(9)]-[unit.time(17)])]. You'll have to come back later if you want to browse the wares on offer.

#ENDIF

Pushing open the door to Arcane Arts once again, your arrival is announced by the familiar sound of a little bell ringing above you. Unlike the other times you've visited, the greater wolf-girl, Vicky, is nowhere to be seen. As the door swings shut behind you, however, you suddenly spot movement out of the corner of your eye.

#IF(game.isMuskContentEnabled()) #IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_vicky_claimed))

[vicky.speech(Why do you not carry my scent?!)] the wolf-girl angrily growls as she leaps out of the shadows. Locking the door and pinning you up against the wall in one swift motion, she allows a wild, predatory grin to settle on her face as she continues, [vicky.speech(You've removed my musk, haven't you?)]

With the dominant, ferocious wolf-girl continuing to hold you in place, you feel like you have no choice but to respond to her question by giving her a nod.

[vicky.speech(That's a bad little prey,)] she snaps, before declaring, [vicky.speech(I'll need to mark you as mine again. I'll cum on your face, and then you'll once again carry the scent of my musk.)]

Although she's dominantly demanding this of you, the wolf-girl doesn't make a move, and you realise that she's wanting you to once again give your consent. Although she'll likely take it badly, you could always use this opportunity to refuse her. Then again, you could submit and reclaim your place as Vicky's 'good little prey'...
